content: When you finally find your way outside, look to the right to find a sloping sandy path leading down. There’s actually a ledge ahead in the ruined building with a chest, but getting it to can be the most aggravating experience unless you use a trick.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Crouching_Tiger_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Crouching Tiger Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Temple Cellar'.
The content is as follows:
When you finally find your way outside, look to the right to find a sloping sandy path leading down. There’s actually a ledge ahead in the ruined building with a chest, but getting it to can be the most aggravating experience unless you use a trick.
